attributes.action: Stop Muslim Extremists and Islam laws in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Ive watched so many videos of Muslims protesting, Causing distress to British Citizens and its wrong. Its time we stood up and reclaim our Country, The longer this goes on the more terrorism, Muslim extremists and immigration there will be. This is England and this is our Law, Our Country and Our Freedom and no Race or Culture can make us change that. Please sign this and make England a safer place for future generations.
